entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64: Assertion failed 'interval->isWriteThru'/runtime crash in release #58083
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • TaskTimeoutExtensions.WhenAllOrAnyFailed eats OperationCanceledExceptions from awaited tasks #58081
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, test bug, 7.0.0
  • QUIC: Peer closing connection can result in OperationCanceledException on pending write #58078
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata doesn't handle generic attributes #58073
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 6.0.0
  • HTTP3: Http3Stream is not removed from _activeRequests table until response Stream Dispose is called #58072
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • Diagnostics.Process.Start: UseShellExecute=true and EnvironmentVariables gotcha #58069
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, untriaged
  • [QualityWeek] Check-Release diffs with x86 #58063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Mono GC crash in CI #58062
    untriaged, area-GC-mono
  • Sending HTTP requests without normalizing path and query #58057
    enhancement, area-System.Net.Http, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • How to let coroutine on a single thread #58050
    area-System.Threading, untriaged
  • Missing FailFast message in Mono ".crash" file #58049
    untriaged, area-VM-meta-mono, os-maccatalyst
  • Rename/consolidate NgenHashTable in CoreCLR #58048
    area-VM-coreclr, untriaged, in pr
  • [API Proposal]: Additional ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull overloads #58047
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime
  • Memory access violation when using named pipes on Alpine #58045
    area-VM-coreclr, os-alpine, untriaged
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException : The PKCS#12 Exportable flag is not supported on this platform. breaking many tests on tvOS simulator #58044
    area-System.Security, untriaged, os-tvos, in pr
  • Servicing Readiness Tasks for .NET 6 #58042
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • ReadyToRun compilation of WinUI projects fails under .NET 6 #58035
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, untriaged, 6.0.0
  • [mono] CustomAttrBuilder does not support RuntimeType arguments #58019
    area-System.Reflection-mono, in pr
  • Test failure GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate #58018
    area-System.Net.Http, test-run-core, 7.0.0
  • [mono] DefineDynamicAssembly ignores PublicKeyToken #58015
    area-System.Reflection-mono, in pr
  • [mono] RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements not supported #58013
    area-System.Reflection-mono, in pr
  • DotNet 6 Preview 7: Inconsistent Get/Set Timestamps when Symlinks are Involved #58012
    area-System.IO, needs further triage
  • DeflateStream as a base class causes infinite loop in async scenario. #58039
    area-System.IO, untriaged
  • .net core 3.1 DeflateStream is incompatible with .net framework 4.8 DeflateStream #58038
    area-System.IO.Compression, untriaged
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_FromStream<LoginViewModel> #58025
    area-Serialization, untriaged
  • Regression in Single/Double parsing #58027
    area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Perf regression in string handling / culture ICU #58029
    area-System.Memory, untriaged
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated sending wrong credentials #58033
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • Use Span<Char>.Fill in String(Char, Int32) constructor #57993
    area-System.Runtime, up-for-grabs
  • Test failure ThresholdExceeded_ThrowsException #57991
    area-System.Net.Http, os-mac-os-x, test-run-core, Future
  • HttpClient with client certificate - stop send of intermediate certificate #57989
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, 7.0.0

Closed

  • An exception error pops up when converting Persian calendar To Gregorian calendar #57994
    area-System.Globalization, untriaged
  • Test failure System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendFile_CancellableTask.GreaterThan2GBFile_SendsAllBytes #57907
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x, test bug, test-run-core, 6.0.0
  • dotnet test fails with error "Cannot get symbol ubrk_close_68 from libicui18n" with AppLocalIcu #57942
    area-System.Globalization, 6.0.0
  • Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/sgen/sgen-alloc.c:409, condition `<disabled>' not met #57976
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, needs author feedback, Future
  • hostfxr.dll loading failing on Windows 11 Arm64 with .NET 6 RC2 #57953
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Remove PlainPointer/RelativePointer/RelativeFixupPointer #57706
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Assertion while debugging #58021
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.0
  • /tmp not writable on tvOS device, breaking Path.GetTempPath #57638
    area-System.IO, blocking-release, os-tvos, in pr, 6.0.0
  • Change Environment.GetFolderPath to be compatible with tvOS #34007
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, os-ios, in pr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] ReleaseJSOwnedObjectByGCHandle - Value cannot be null #58031
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.0
  • How to let coroutine on a single thread。 #58051
    area-System.Threading, untriaged
  • [HTTP/3] IncompleteResponseStream_ResponseDropped_CancelsRequestToServer test fails #53089
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Decompression_Tests.GetAsync_SetAutomaticDecompression_ContentDecompressed_Deflate(uri: \"https://httpbin.org/deflate\", expectedContent: \"\\\"deflated\\\": true\") #52889
    arch-arm64, area-System.Net.Http, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • EventLogRecord.GetFormatDescription() throws "The specified resource type cannot be found in the image file." exception #56469
    easy, up-for-grabs, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault #57840
    area-Host, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Text API's #57980
    api-suggestion, untriaged
  • Add EventSource event for service registration statistics #52364
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 6.0.0
  • System.DivideByZero exception in System.Threading.FastRandom.Next(Int32 maxValue) #40639
    area-System.Threading, needs more info, Future
  • [Regression] Json - Serialization and deserialization of 'System.Type' instances are not supported #58006
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • API documentation debt - System.Collections #43850
    documentation, area-System.Collections, up-for-grabs, 6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json modify property value in runtime #57997
    api-suggestion, area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • JITted code throws NullRefException in release #56980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Invalid CSE with field seqs #54102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\opt\\Structs\\structcopies\\structcopies.cmd in jitstress #49954
    JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Buffers.Tests.ArrayBufferWriterTests_Char.Advance #42517
    bug, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • System.Linq.Enumerable has special treatment of IList<T>, which should also apply to IReadOnlyList<T> #57822
    area-System.Linq, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate2.RawDataMemory #57448
    api-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Error using System.Drawing.Common with FSI #57922
    area-System.Drawing

Updated

  • System.Text.Json: Method not found System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoder.FindFirstCharacterToEncodeUtf8 happening in Xamarin.Android #56544
    area-System.Memory, needs more info, packaging, os-android, needs author feedback, Future
  • System.Text.Json code generator: custom converter ignored? #58119
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • Recurring test failures in tracing due to class loader alloc tracker heap corruption #57461
    arch-x86, os-windows, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    area-Serialization, untriaged
  • Feed unreliability affecting CI #55449
    tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, Future
  • system.io.pipelines.tests.flushasynctests.flushasync_throwsifwriterreaderwithexception #55435
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, disabled-test, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0
  • Several System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs tests fail with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException #31281
    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, Future
  • runtime xunit wrapper build failed #45378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    bug, os-linux, area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • bundled_self_contained_nocompression_app_run_succeeds blocking CI #53551
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher_DirectorySymbolicLink_TargetsFile_Fails #53366
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success failing on win-arm64 #51651
    arch-arm64, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, test-run-core, Future
  • InterruptInFinallyBlockTest_SkipOnDesktopFramework failed on Linux Debug x64 Mono in CI #43953
    area-Threading-mono, runtime-mono, 7.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests.OSSupportTest.IOControl_SIOCATMARK_Unix_Success test failure on macOS #50748

    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, test bug, test-run-core, 7.0.0

  • [System.Linq] Performance: .ToList() counter-intuitively slower than .ToArray() #58100
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, untriaged

    api-needs-work, area-System.Runtime, Future
  • Tests which depend on the host don't use a live built version #58109
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Annotate Microsoft.Extensions.* assemblies for nullable reference types #43605
    area-Meta, User Story, needs further triage, 7.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests crashing on Mariner OS #57810
    area-System.Security, disabled-test, runtime-mono, os-mariner
  • Exception in test infrastructure - System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified after the enumerator was instantiated #11063

  • Tests failed: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest / * #21924

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix a few places where we did not use Register type for struct locals. #58082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Rename NGenHashTable to DacEnumerableHashTable to describe its unique feature and remove dead code #58080
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix trigger paths for perf_slow.yml #58079
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix trigger paths for perf_slow.yml #58077
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Migrate LoggerMessageGenerator to IIncrementalGenerator #58068
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • More CI stabilization work #58065
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58064
  • get docker info #58061
    NO REVIEW
  • Allow configuration binder to bind single elements to array #58060
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Adding x64 on ARM64 support to installers #58059
    * NO MERGE *, area-Setup
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #58056
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime
  • Remove last vestiges of nidump now that NGEN is dead #58052
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from mono/linker #58043
    Servicing-consider
  • [HTTP/3] Reenabled ReadAsStreamAsync_HandlerProducesWellBehavedResponseStream #58041
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58036
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #58034
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono] Allow RuntimeType arguments in CustomAttributeBuilder #58020
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Support public key token in DefineDynamicAssembly #58016
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Support RuntimeType.MakeGenericType with non-RuntimeType elements #58014
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove (unsupported) target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing documentation in new EnsureCapacity methods #58007
    documentation, area-System.Collections, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix VN incorrect optimizations with a new JitEEInterface function. #58005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't consider classes that do not have any attributes or base classes #58004
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add internal junction support to link APIs #57996
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
